description: Command-line shell and scripting language designed especially for system administration. This command refers to PowerShell version 5.1 and below (also known as the legacy Windows PowerShell). To use the newer, cross-platform version of PowerShell (also known as PowerShell Core), use pwsh instead of powershell. More information: https://learn.microsoft.com/windows-server/administration/windows-commands/powershell.
